CustomField.description: Percentage of hours completed on this milestone, to be used in Revenue Forecasting calculations. When you run a revenue forecast on the project that relates to this milestone, the following calculation is used to work out the value in this field: (Sum of approved timecard hours /Value in Planned Hours field) multiplied by 100. This field is only populated when "% Complete" is displayed in the Recognition Method field, or when you are using the integration with FinancialForce Revenue Management and this milestone looks up to a FinancialForce Revenue Management template of type "% Complete".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Percentage of hours completed, for Revenue Forecasting calculations using the "% Complete" recognition method. The value is (Sum of approved timecard hours /Value in Planned Hours field) multiplied by 100.
CustomField.label: % Hours Completed for Recognition
